content: I think I'll start by listing my items on Facebook Marketplace and local online selling groups. I've had good experiences with those platforms in the past, and they're easy to use. I'll also consider listing my laptop on eBay or Craigslist to reach a wider audience. For the CDs and clothing, I might try using specialized platforms like Discogs or Poshmark to attract buyers who are specifically looking for those types of items.
